text: The Leelavati Award is an award for outstanding contribution to public outreach in mathematics. It was first given during 2010 International Congress of Mathematicians. == Laureates == * 2010: Simon Singh * 2014: Adri√°n Paenza * 2018: Ali Nesin * 2022: Nikolai Andreev == References == Category:Science awards
title: Leelavati Award
